data.price: 他说：“关于他们的知识，在我的主那里记录在一本书中。我的主，既不错误，又不疏忽。”
data.arabic: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى

meta.transliteration: qāla ʿil'muhā ʿinda rabbī fī kitābin lā yaḍillu rabbī walā yansā

dua.name: Dua for Inner Contentment
dua.significanceReason: Seeks understanding and acceptance of divine decree, promoting inner peace and contentment.

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
